about_the_game:
Your mission is to rid the planet of litter, restore its natural beauty, and protect its wildlife. Explore vibrant and diverse locations—from sandy deserts to lush green jungles—while developing your self-sufficient eco-friendly outpost.

Planetary Restoration: Lecoons, the native inhabitants of this planet will need your help. Use your vacuum to clean the planet, collect scattered debris, and earn Recycling Points to buy goods at various vendors at the local galactic market.

Build and Craft: Use recycled materials to develop your outpost. Craft tools, workbenches, furniture and even clothes. Since you are going to stay there for a while, why not make yourself comfortable? Customize your home, clothes and learn cooking.

Meet other volunteers: As your outpost develops, a cast of quirky characters will join you in this important mission. Get to know them - it’s easier to work as a team.

Corporation experiments: Prepare your fishing rod and a trusty bug net. Garbage isn’t the only thing left by The Corporation. You’ll have to catch invasive Fishbots, Robobugs and Mutated Vegetables.

Subterranean Secrets: Delve into mines to unearth rare resources and unravel the mysteries of the planet's past. What was The Corporation looking for and why did they leave? The answers lie beneath the surface.

Multiplayer Adventure: Feeling lonely? Invite a friend to join your mission! Work together in co-op mode to restore the world faster and share in the joy of creation.

Plant based game: No animals will be harmed during the playthrough of this game.

name: Cozynauts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Clean, Construct and Chill. Join the ranks of the Cozynauts, an intergalactic non-profit organization focused on cleaning up planets polluted by The Corporation.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
